short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize and manage your open tabs easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Organizer is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by helping you manage and organize your open tabs efficiently. With its intuitive features, you can easily close duplicate tabs, filter through your open tabs, and keep track of your browsing statistics.

Key Features:

Basic Functionality:

Close Duplicate Tabs: Quickly identifies and closes all duplicate tabs with the same URL, reducing clutter and enhancing productivity.
Close Tabs from the Same Website: Seamlessly closes all tabs from the same website while keeping the currently active tab open.
Search Functionality:

Dynamic Search Bar: Effortlessly search open tabs by title or URL. The search functionality filters tabs in real-time as you type, making it easy to find what you need.
Tab Statistics:

Total Number of Open Tabs: Stay informed with a real-time display of the total number of open tabs in your browser.
Number of Duplicate Tabs: Get insights into how many duplicate tabs are currently open, helping you manage your tab usage effectively.
UI Enhancements:

Improved Visuals: A clean and modern interface designed for ease of use.

Responsive Design: Ensures a great experience on various screen sizes.
Why Choose Tab Organizer? Whether you're a casual browser or a power user, Tab Organizer is designed to streamline your browsing experience. With its powerful features and user-friendly interface, you can declutter your browser and stay organized effortlessly.

Get started with Tab Organizer today and take control of your browsing experience!
